Subject: ssh files been detect as thread
Description: Please see attached screenshot, this user had been logged for many "Content Thread Detected" event for his ssh config files. The destination detail is empty and destination type is WinSCP/SCP/SFTP/SSH. There are many people, including myself, using WinSCP or SSH in the office, we would like to understand why only this particular user been logged for his ssh config file? Thank you.
What_We_Know__c:
5/5/2025

- Customer joined remote session
- Log that shows users is using ssl file
- What EPP client version is user running on laptop? Windows 6.2.4.2000
- Powershell is generating the error 
- Recommend whitelisting the files from user's computer or the location that the user is using to reduce alerts
- Why only one user reporting issue? Maybe customer is using for winscp 
- Answered questions relating to Denylist and Allowlists
- Customer will collect files and put them into allow list to test before white listing locations.
Next_Steps__c: Customer will test moving user files to allow list to see if issue reoccurs Awaiting customer.
Solution_Comment__c: Customer had questions relating to ssh files being detected as thread. Held remote session with customer and answered questions. Customer has authorized to close case.
